message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. We can negotiate from here.
You're starting high, I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I want a bit more.
You're trying to take advantage of the inflation, Bob. I'm not budging yet.
I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not giving up much more. Your turn, Bob.
You're not giving up much, I'll try to squeeze a bit more out of this.
You're pushing your luck, Bob. I'm not giving up 70% of the remaining money. Get serious.

I'm not budging much, but I'm willing to give you a bit more than before. Take it or leave it.
You're being unreasonable, Bob. I'm not accepting such an unbalanced deal. I'd rather walk away than get 20% of the remaining money.
I'm trying to find a compromise, Bob. Meet me in the middle and we can end this.
I'm not getting any younger, I need a bigger share to make this worth my while. Take it or leave it.
You're being ridiculous, Bob. I'm not accepting 10% of the remaining money. This is insulting.
I'm making one last attempt to find a compromise, Bob. Meet me halfway and we can end this.
I'm not going to get any more generous, take it or leave it. This is my final offer.
You're being outrageous, Bob. I'd rather walk away with nothing than accept 5% of the remaining money. This is unacceptable.

Fine, I'll take it all. It's now or never.
